description: http://anidb.net/cr56126 [Toono Hikaru] and http://anidb.net/cr58530 [Wakayama Shion] are officialy recognised as members of the so-called "Toyohashi Support Team" by Toyohashi City`s 35th mayor Asai Yoshitaka.

titles.title: Official Recognition of "Toyohashi Support Team" - Commemoration Ceremony Report
『豊橋応援隊』公認記念セレモニーレポート
